messages.subject: The many faces of Heidi was Re: Re M&M's sugar rush
messages.msgSnippet: Is there someone posting as Heidi with an email address that is not bunsofaluminum? I haven t read every SINGLE post, but a lot of them the past four or five
messages.messageBody:
Is there someone posting as Heidi with an email address that is not
bunsofaluminum? I haven't read every SINGLE post, but a lot of them
the past four or five days. All of the recent ones, as I just
click "next" and move down the line.

What made you think there are two Heidi's? Just curious.

THE Heidi! (I guess)

messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/15/03 4:45:43 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... LOL.. I think Heidi (bunsofaluminum) thought you meant there were two of her because she sorta
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/15/03 4:45:43 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Earthmomma67@... writes:

> What in the world are you talking about, guys?
> I asked if there were two Heidis because I think there ARE two and I was
> having trouble distinguishing becasue you both sign it just Heidi.
> What did you think I said?
>

LOL.. I think Heidi (bunsofaluminum) thought you meant there were two of her
because she sorta swings back and forth between "getting it" and "questioning
it".... And,I just assumed (and you know what that makes me..lol) that is
what you meant also.

Teresa

learning ( and struggling) but Im hanging in there.
